title: Sour Patch Smugglers
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about smuggling candy to Alice while she's at camp, the scariest movies Patton's seen recently, and why they are taking a break from podcasting.

Have something interesting you'd like to share? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com or leave us a message at speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
